metadata.title: CVE-2013-7220 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
js/ui/screenShield.js in GNOME Shell (aka gnome-shell) before 3.8 allowsphysically proximate attackers to execute arbitrary commands by leveragingan unattended workstation with the keyboard focus on the Activities search.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7220` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-shell - 3.18.5-0ubuntu0.3
gnome-shell-common - 3.18.5-0ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnome-shell package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.18.5-0ubuntu0.3').
